Package org.hibernate.query.criteria

Interface JpaQueryableCriteria<T>

All Superinterfaces:
CommonAbstractCriteria, JpaCriteriaBase, JpaCriteriaNode, JpaCteContainer, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
JpaCriteriaDelete<T>, JpaCriteriaInsert<T>, JpaCriteriaInsertSelect<T>, JpaCriteriaInsertValues<T>, JpaCriteriaQuery<T>, JpaCriteriaUpdate<T>, JpaManipulationCriteria<E>, SqmDeleteOrUpdateStatement<T>, SqmDmlStatement<E>, SqmInsertStatement<T>, SqmStatement<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSqmDmlStatement, AbstractSqmInsertStatement, AbstractSqmRestrictedDmlStatement, AbstractSqmStatement, CriteriaDefinition, SqmDeleteStatement, SqmInsertSelectStatement, SqmInsertValuesStatement, SqmSelectStatement, SqmUpdateStatement
public interface JpaQueryableCriteria<T> extends JpaCriteriaBase, JpaCriteriaNode, JpaCteContainer
Common contract for the forms of criteria that are "queryable" - can be converted into a Query. Hibernate extension to the JPA CommonAbstractCriteria contract.
